intro: Umsema, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to eastern Africa. It belongs to the genus Saintpaulia and is characterized by its velvety, waxy leaves and showy, tubular flowers. Its botanical features make it a favorite among both amateur and professional gardeners.
